website_summaries.verdict: The size of the screen and the high refresh rate and response time are designed with gamers in mind, but the picture quality also makes this a good traditional-use monitor for users who want a single unit to serve both purposes.
pros: The 144 Hz refresh rate and 1 ms response time are both outstanding rates for gaming use, reducing ghosting of graphics and lag time
X light technology offers true black and vivid bright colors, and the adjustable base allows users to view the screen from any angle, another gaming bonus
For those who want to use the same monitor for computer use, the 1080p picture quality reduces blur for less eyestrain during long work sessions
cons: Users may notice slight backlight bleed during darker videos or game scenes

customer_reviews.title: ... for this price range it is hands down the best. the settings are so rich that I have ...

customer_reviews.title: 144hz and low Input Lag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I play Rocket League and the predecessor to this monitor XG2401 was rated at a 10ms input lag response (One of the fastest 144hz monitors). I imagine this XG2402 is the same, if not better. In any case it changes the way I play RL for the better, especially coming from 60hz. Only 2 minor problems so far: 1. Buttons on front rock the monitor up and down when you press them. 2. The wire holder on the back is pretty flimsy and I almost broke it trying to put it on the stand. Otherwise very pleased and I recommend highly after about 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price, and does 144hz through hdmi!

Works flawlessly, Colors are decent especially for the price and the stand is amazing and very adjustable. Perfect budget gaming monitor. Highly recommend especially if you might be in an oddball situation like myself.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Bad Display-Port cable.

customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a quality displayport cable. Provided one is old and bad
customer_reviews.text: G-sync compatible now but will not function properly with the provided displayport cable. Buy a newer, quality one that doesn't have the 20th pin (power). Others have noted poor colors and other issues with the provided DP cable. This screen is one of the best for 1080p 144hz gaming. Great response time, input lag, with no ghosting. It is a TN panel, do not expect VA or IPS quality when watching video content, this is ideal for fast paced games, like first-person shooters. A little bit of backlight bleed on mine but not really noticeable in games. Colors are quite decent, better than most TNs, extra gamma settings help a lot.

customer_reviews.title: TN Panels have come a long way

The image quality is really good. The viewing angles on this panel are better than I expected. Your buddy won't have a problem watching you game on this. Be aware that Freesync is not enabled by default. It has to be turned on from the monitor's onscreen menus and then it needs to be enabled on the graphics card. I'm using a Sapphire Radion Nitro+ RX580 graphics card with this monitor and it works great!

product_meta.title: ViewSonic XG2402 24 Inch 1080p 1ms 144 Hz Gaming Monitor with FreeSync Eye Care Advanced Ergonomics ColorX Mode HDMI and DP for Esports
product_meta.description: The ViewSonic XG2402 is a 24” (24” viewable) Full HD monitor packed with all the speed and features that diehard gaming enthusiasts need. Featuring an incredible 144Hz refresh rate, as well as VESA Adaptive-Sync Technology, this monitor’s variable refresh rate capabilities virtually eliminate screen tearing and stuttering for fluid gameplay during fast-paced action scenes. A blazing-fast 1ms response time and low input lag provides smooth screen performance even in the most graphic-intense sequences. For a game-winning competitive edge, a Game Mode feature optimizes visuals for FPS, RTS and MOBA. On top of that, a customizable 22-level black stabilization function helps you target enemies lurking in the dark, while the monitor maintains brilliantly rich colors and contrast. With a gamer-inspired ergonomic stand that features an integrated headphone hook and cable management functionality, the XG2402 has all you need to conquer your gaming and entertainment quests. Voltage AC 100-240V (universal), 50-60Hz. The brightness is 300 cd/m2. Viewing Angles 170 Degrees Horizontal, 160 Degrees Vertical.
